sentences.english: The political impact of what Bush and I were doing was uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 老布什和我在當時的口水仗有何政治影響，還不好說。

sentences.english: I'm not looking to get in any war of words with Phil Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 我不期待與禪師展開任何口水仗。

sentences.english: The flame war will revolve around the issue of something called “web standards.” I’ll let Dean introduce the problem
sentences.chinese: 這場口水仗將圍繞所謂的“web標準”問題展開。
